remarks:
If ` z ` is not free in ` ph ` , it is not free in ` [ y / x ] ph ` when ` y ` and ` z ` are distinct.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-1993.)

 If ` z ` is not free in ` ph ` , it is not free in ` [ y / x ] ph ` when ` y ` and ` z ` are distinct.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-1993.)  (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 22-Mar-2018.)
statement:
hbsb.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. z ph ) $.
hbsb $p |- ( [ y / x ] ph -> A. z [ y / x ] ph ) $.
$d y z $.
